snippet.title: Magic and Machines - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Magic and Machines is available now on mobile (iOS and Android) and Steam (Windows and macOS)!

iOS - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/magic-and-machines/id6446097904
Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.LittleBearStudios.MagicandMachines
Steam (Demo available)- https://store.steampowered.com/app/2341800/Magic_and_Machines/
itch.io - https://littlebearstudios.itch.io/magic-and-machines


Journey into the world of Magic and Machines, a retro fantasy turn-based RPG. This game features six unique party members on a quest to uncover the mysteries of their decaying world. You’ll discover new areas, complete puzzles with your elemental powers, and battle foes in a turn-based battle system with the Overload mechanic that lets you supercharge your attacks such as dealing more damage, increasing buff effects and duration, and healing above your maximum health in battle. Magic and Machines is perfect for players who grew up with turn-based RPGs looking for a new adventure while also being accessible for new players as it doesn’t take itself too seriously.
